article_title: Latest trend: Hospitals build bigger rooms to accommodate obese patients
article_text:

article_metadata.description: The revamped 17-story Parkland Hospital in Dallas features 862 single-patient rooms that are ready to accommodate a growing number of obese patients,The New York Times reports.
